thread.title: BREAKING: Trump wants National Guard to round up illegal immigrants in promised crackdown
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Trump wants National Guard to round up illegal immigrants in promised crackdown

title: BREAKING: Trump wants National Guard to round up illegal immigrants in promised crackdown
text:
BREAKING: Trump wants National Guard to round up illegal immigrants in promised crackdown BREAKING: Trump wants National Guard to round up illegal immigrants in promised crackdown DONALD Trump is considering mobilising as many as 100,000 National Guard troops to round up illegal immigrants in the US. PUBLISHED: 15:37, Fri, Feb 17, 2017 | UPDATED: 15:40, Fri, Feb 17, 2017 
The plans were outlined in a draft memo calling for the unprecedented militarisation of US immigration enforcement. 
State governors would have the final say on how many troops are actually deployed if the idea was implemented. 
White House spokesperson Michael Short denied the story in a tweet which simply said: “Not true.” 
MORE FOLLOWS...
